message.body: Did you receive on January 17 two keypad garage door openers, which I had ordered through your account, and were supposed to ne delivered to my address. if you received them, can you return them, and I'll reorder them directly. Let me know, Mare Sea
Oh it will be easier for me to send them to u
I was going to go to post office Thursday morning
OK, send them the cheapest way and tell me how much you paid so that I can reimburse you with interest!
sorry i was on the phone with a student
sorry i donâ€™t know by heart
you liked that drone poem eh?
Paul, from now on when you ride Metro North sit in the middle cars and avoid front and back cars!
And your mom was great too, she brought you into this world in the Mid Plains!
